DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy One Other Person With Patient Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the quantity of days there was one other person with the patent during radiation treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy One Other Person With Patient
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._A human being._Used to indicate the presence of something or someone._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A human being.:Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Used to indicate the presence of something or someone.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 03/27/2018: CM Released as part of draft content review

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Number of radiation treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of radiation treatments during which at least one other person accompanied patient
